name: Chameleon of WallStrich
description: Chameleon of Wallstrich is a stealth game where you can't choose to hide.he player controls Leon, a drunk Chameleon going to robber an Ostrich Mansion. Since he is drunk, he won't make the bests decisions and he'll change colors by contacting with colourful statues. He can change colors using his tongue too. The objective of the game is to get your hands at the Golden Ostrich Statue, using camouflage as best as you can to bypass the Colour Blind Ostrich Guards.
